overview: Newly wed Kenna James engages the services of Jessa Rhodes to save her floundering marriage. Summer camp counselor Valentina Paradis aces her job interview with head counselor Sara Luvv. new hire camp counselor Valentina Paradis experiences a strapon during her next visit with head counselor Sara Luvv. Kenna James is torn between her husband and her new lesbian lover, sex specialist Jessa Rhodes.
title: Frigid: A Tale Of Persistence
